Question: [Upskilling course] contents are relevant to me.
In the last 6 months, have you used any services from [Company]?
Have you experienced any challenges with [Company]? (SS)
What was your challenge with [Company]? (OE)
Since this time [XX] year, how has the number of customers or sales changed?
Since this time [XX] year, have you introduced new products or services to offer your customers?
In the last 6 months, has your business product(s)quality or services improved?

Which of the following are the impacts from the[XXX] program that makes you feel more optimistic in your business ability to survive in the event of external negative shocks such as a market downturn or a health crisis.
Since using [Company] [product/service], have the profits you earn from your business grown?
Please provide an estimate of your business's revenue over the following time periods.
In the past [XX] months, have you suffered any kind of shock that reduced your business revenue?
How long did the impact of the shock last?
How long did the shock last?
What measure helped you cope the most with this shock?
What was the nature of the shock?
Imagine an emergency where you need a lump sum amounting to a month’s business revenue. How difficult would it be to come up with the equivalent of 1 month’s revenue?

On a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 means VERY PESSIMISTIC: I believe my business will fail soon and 5 means VERY OPTIMISTIC: I am confident that my business will thrive and grow, how optimistic are you about the future of your business?
Imagine tomorrow that your business has an unexpected emergency and needs to come up with 51,000 Czech Koruna within the next month. What would be your primary option for coming up with the money?
In the last [XX] months, have you adopted any new strategies to cope with potential business shocks?
In the last [XX] months, has the number of sources you can access funds from within a week increased?
How has the use of digital technologies improved your overall business efficiency?
In the last 12 months, have you been able to reduce business costs by adopting new practices or products/services
In the last 12 months, have you been able to save time in your business by adopting new practices or products/services?
How confident are you in your ability to effectively utilize technology to enhance your business operations? Are you…
Has your network of fellow business owners expanded since participating in the program/ in the last [XX] months?
How regularly does your business set aside funds or resources as a buffer to cope with unexpected expenses or downturns?
Category: Adoption of business practices, Capabilities, Resilience

Question: How would you rate your overall business (marketing/finance/people) capabilities for managing and growing your current business right now?
